channel.title: Quentin Tarantino on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Burbank Int’l Film Fest: Quentin Tarantino Set for Vanguard Award, Career-Retrospective Conversation, on ‘Quentin Tarantino Day’
item.description: The Oscar-winning auteur will be toasted by the mayor of Burbank, in which he has shot portions of his films, and the mayor of El Segundo, where he spent part of his childhood, on Sept. 28.

item.title: Quentin Tarantino Shares Michael Madsen ‘Reservoir Dogs’ Story During Private Memorial: ‘I’m On Your Side, Buddy’
